page.title: 09Entertainment in Corby.
page.content: There is a variety of entertainment available in Corby, most of which is quite inexpensive, as loans and grants from Govt. and regional funds are used to support the cost. Indoor facilities include a Civic Theatre Complex, Olympic standard swimming pool, with sauna and jacuzzi, and a number of sports centres offering a wide variety of sporting opportunities. There is also a Library and two cinemas (in the same building). Outdoor facilities are equally as good. Almost in the town centre are many acres of woodland for walking and there is an boating lake in the centre of these which provides boating and fishing as well as pop concerts in the summer. There is also an 18 hole golf course and in 1985 a huge outdoor sports complex was opened in the town by Neil Kinnock, the Labour Leader.
